name: Gaurav
headerTaglineTwo: I'm Gaurav Varma - Bay Area developer.

services.title: Software Engineering
services.description: I offer full stack software solutions leveraging a cutting edge tech stack to deliver optimal performance

services.title: Data Analytics
services.description: Drawing on my background as a management consultant and business analyst at Deloitte and other Fortune 100 companies, I identify and present key insights in your businesses data

aboutpara: I'm a software engineer with strong business acumen, dedicated to delivering world-class user experiences. My expertise lies in Next.js, Javascript, and various web frameworks, which I've applied in diverse roles at companies like Philly Truce, DGCL, Vhangry, and Fleek. With a background in Economics from Dartmouth College, I bring a unique perspective to software development, combining technical proficiency in languages like JavaScript, HTML5, CSS, and Python with a keen understanding of business needs. I'm passionate about leveraging technology to solve real-world problems and constantly seeking new opportunities to grow and make an impact.
